# RNAseq


```{r}
#| label: setup
#| warning: false
getwd()
library(DESeq2)
library(here)
renv::use(lockfile = here("rnaseq/renv.lock"))
source("rnaseq/R/DESeqDataSetFromFeatureCounts.R")
counts_file <- "./data/RNAseq/20240409_Tet2Rhoa-S1P1_RA/ra_counts.tsv"
design_file <- "./data/RNAseq/20240409_Tet2Rhoa-S1P1_RA/ra_design.tsv"
dds <- DESeq(DESeqDataSetFromFeatureCounts(counts_file, design_file))
saveRDS(dds, file = here("rnaseq/dds.rds"))
```
